name: Siuil a Run
content: I  wish  I  was  on  yonder  hill
And  every  tear  would  turn  a  mill
Iss  guh  day  thoo  avorneen  slawn

And  every  tear  would  turn  a  mill
Iss  guh  day  thoo  avorneen  slawn
Suil  Suil  Suil  a  run
Sui  go  doras  agus  ealeaigh  liom
Iss  guh  day  thoo  avorneen  slawn
